summary: Titan Company Limited is projected to post a 38% year-on-year rise in Q2 FY26 profit, supported by steady core business growth and a low base effect. The company has redeemed INR15 billion in commercial papers, indicating a stable financial position. However, high gold prices may pose a risk to the company's jewelry business. The stock price has shown a 10.7% increase over the past year. Due to limited data on current stock prices, the confidence in this analysis is moderate.

evidence.quote: Titan Company is projected to post a 38% year-on-year rise in Q2 FY26 profit, supported by steady core business growth and a low base effect.
Titan Company redeemed INR15 billion in commercial papers on December 11.
